name: World Eater (TigerStriped)
description:
3d Infinite platformer/ runner with some easily unlockable characters ;)

Move with WASD, jump with space and dash with right shift! Get the coins to unlock more characters dash through enemies, don't fall down and don't let the World Eater to get you! Have fun.

Map is infinitely generated.

Be prepared that the first time you play you will have a lag spike. Not sure what causes this. 

Download the desktop version, it has no lags.
